Description: This workload template deploys an OO Central cluster, an OO Workflow Designer instance and an AWS RDS PostgreSQL database instance **WARNING** This template creates EC2 instances and related resources. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template. (qs-1pg0022na)

S3BucketNameForCluster.default: S3 bucket name for OO cluster

S3KeyPrefixForCluster.default: S3 key name prefix for OO cluster

CWCentralMonitoring.ConstraintDescription: The CloudWatch monitoring option must be set to either false or true
CWCentralMonitoring.Description: Choose 'true' to enable detailed CloudWatch monitoring of the OO Central instances for an additional cost

CWDesignerMonitoring.ConstraintDescription: Must be either false or true
CWDesignerMonitoring.Description: Choose 'true' to enable detailed CloudWatch monitoring on the OO Workflow Designer instances for an additional cost

DBBackupRetentionPeriod.Description: Select the number of days that Amazon RDS should retain automatic backups of the DB instance. A backup retention period of zero days will disable automated backups for the DB Instance

DBInstanceType.Description: Type of EC2 instance for the database server.

DBMasterPassword.ConstraintDescription: The password for the database 'master' user name and it's confirmation must be between 8 and 32 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

DBMasterPasswordConfirm.ConstraintDescription: The password for the Database master username and it's confirmation must be between 8 and 32 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
DBMasterPasswordConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the database 'master' user

DBMasterUsername.ConstraintDescription: The database 'master' user name must be between alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases and must be between 2 and 32 chars long
DBMasterUsername.Description: The name of the database 'master' user

DBMultiAZ.Description: Choose 'true' to deploy the database across multiple Availability Zones

DBPreferredBackupWindow.Description: The daily time range in UTC during which the database automated backups are created. Must be in the format hh24:mi-hh24:mi, the time interval must be at least 30 minutes, and must not conflict with the preferred maintenance window

DBPreferredMaintenanceWindow.Description: The weekly time range in UTC during which system maintenance can occur. Must be in the format ddd:hh24:mi-ddd:hh24:mi and must not conflict with the preferred backup window

DBStorageInGB.Description: Define the allocated storage for the database server (in GBs) - minimum 20, maximum 16384

ELBAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: The load balancer CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/x
ELBAccessCIDR.Description: The CIDR IP range that is permitted to access the load balancer. We recommend that you set this value to a trusted IP range. If you have chosen the 'internal' Load Balancer scheme, then the IP range you enter here must exist in your VPC

ELBScheme.ConstraintDescription: The load balancer scheme must be either 'internet-facing' or 'internal'
ELBScheme.Description: Choose 'internal' to prevent assigning the load balancer a public IP address. The DNS name of an internal load balancer will be publicly resolvable to its private IP address.

LicenseAgreement.Description: I have read and agree to the terms of the End User License Agreement for Micro Focus Operations Orchestration (https://www.microfocus.com/media/documentation/micro_focus_end_user_license_agreement.pdf).

NotificationTrigger.ConstraintDescription: E-mail notifications parameter must be set to either 'true' or 'false'
NotificationTrigger.Description: Choose 'false' if you don't want to receive e-mail notifications about failed auto scaling operations

OOCentralDBName.ConstraintDescription: The OO Central database name must be alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases and must be between 2 and 32 chars long
OOCentralDBName.Description: The name for OO Central's database (2-32 characters long)

OOCentralInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid instance type
OOCentralInstanceType.Description: Type of EC2 instance for the OO Central instances

OOCentralNodesSize.ConstraintDescription: Must be any number between: 1 and 10
OOCentralNodesSize.Description: The amount of OO Central instances (nodes) in the cluster - max 10

OOCentralOOPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Central instance - The passwords for the Linux 'oo' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the 'root' user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralOOPass.Description: Password for the Linux 'oo' user inside the OO Central instances. This user has the ownership of OO files and processes. The password must be different than the password of the Linux root user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralOOPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Central instance - The passwords for the Linux 'oo' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the 'root' user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralOOPassConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the Linux 'oo' user inside the OO Central instances. This user has the ownership of OO files and processes. The password must be different than the password of the Linux 'root' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Central administrative password must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralPass.Description: Password for the OO Central administrative 'admin' user. Must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Central administrative password and it's confirmation must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralPassConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the OO Central administrative 'admin' user. Must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralRootPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Central instance - The passwords for the Linux 'root' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the Linux 'oo' user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralRootPass.Description: Password for the Linux 'root' user inside the OO Central instances - Must be different than the password for the Linux 'oo' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralRootPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Central instance - The passwords for the Linux 'root' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the password for the Linux 'oo' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OOCentralRootPassConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the Linux 'root' user inside the OO Central instances - Must be different than the password for the Linux 'oo' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OOCentralT2T3Burst.ConstraintDescription: If OOCentralInstanceType is either a T2 or T3 instance type, the CPU burst mode must be either 'standard' or 'unlimited'
OOCentralT2T3Burst.Description: For T2/T3 instances only, choose the CPU burstable performance mode

OODesignerDBName.ConstraintDescription: The OO Workflow Designer database name must be alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases and must be between 2 and 32 chars long
OODesignerDBName.Description: The name for OO Workflow Designer's database (2-32 characters long). Ignore this parameter if you do not want to deploy OO Workflow Designer

OODesignerInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for OO Workflow Designer

OODesignerOOPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer instance - The passwords for the Linux 'oo' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the Linux 'root' user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerOOPass.Description: Password for the Linux 'oo' user inside the OO Workflow Designer instance. This user has the ownership of OO files and processes. The password must be different than the password for the Linux 'root' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OODesignerOOPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer instance - The passwords for the Linux 'oo' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the root user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerOOPassConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the Linux 'oo' user inside the OO Workflow Designer instance. This user has the ownership of OO files and processes. The password must be different than the password for the Linux 'root' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OODesignerPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer administrative password and it's confirmation must be different than the OO Central 'admin' password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerPass.Description: Password for the OO Workflow Designer administrative 'admin' user. The password must be different than the OO Central 'admin' password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OODesignerPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer administrative password and it's confirmation must be different than the OOCentral admin password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerPassConfirm.Description: The confirmation password for the OO Workflow Designer administrative 'admin' user

OODesignerRootPass.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer instance - The passwords for the Linux 'root' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the oo user password, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerRootPass.Description: Password for the Linux 'root' user inside the OO Workflow Designer instance - Must be different than the password for the Linux 'oo' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OODesignerRootPassConfirm.ConstraintDescription: OO Workflow Designer instance - The passwords for the Linux 'root' user and it's confirmation value must be different than the password for the Linux oo user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?
OODesignerRootPassConfirm.Description: The password confirmation for the Linux 'root' user inside the OO Workflow Designer instance - Must be different than the password for the Linux 'oo' user, must be between 8 and 12 chars long, alphanumeric, can contain uppercases, lowercases, and at least one of the following characters: !#$%^&*()+\-={}|;:,.<>?

OODesignerTrigger.ConstraintDescription: The 'Deploy the OO Workflow Designer' option must be set to either 'true' or 'false'
OODesignerTrigger.Description: Choose 'false' to not deploy the OO Workflow Designer instance. If you choose 'false', then all parameters related to OO Workflow Designer are ignored

OOKeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: The OO Key Pair Name that will be used for SSH access to OO instances must not be empty
OOKeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 key pair for accessing OO Central and OO Workflow Designer EC2 instances

OOSSHAccessSGID.Description: SSH access to OO instances will be allowed from all instances under the security group ID chosen here

OperatorEmail.ConstraintDescription: The Operator Email parameter must be a valid email address
OperatorEmail.Description: (Optional) Email of the person that will be informed about failed auto scaling operations

PrivateSubnet1ID.Description: ID of the private subnet 1 in Availability Zone 1 for OO Central cluster and OO Workflow Designer (e.g., subnet-a0246dcd)

PrivateSubnet2ID.Description: ID of the private subnet 2 in Availability Zone 2 for OO Central cluster and OO Workflow Designer (e.g., subnet-b1f432cd)

PublicSubnet1ID.Description: ID of the public subnet 1 in Availability Zone 1 for the internet-facing Application Load Balancer (e.g., subnet-9bc642ac)

PublicSubnet2ID.Description: ID of the public subnet 2 in Availability Zone 2 for the internet-facing Application Load Balancer (e.g., subnet-e3246d8e)

S3BucketNameForCluster.ConstraintDescription: The S3 bucket for OO Cluster name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
S3BucketNameForCluster.Description: S3 bucket name that will be used by OO Central cluster instances to store the encryption keys. This string can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

S3KeyPrefixForCluster.ConstraintDescription: The S3 key prefix of the S3 bucket for OO Cluster can either be empty or follow this constraint: can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, forward slashes (/), hyphens (-), and must end in a forward slash (/).
S3KeyPrefixForCluster.Description: S3 key prefix for the OO Central cluster instances to store the encryption files. The key prefix can either be empty or follow this constraint: can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, forward slashes (/), hyphens (-), and must end with a forward slash (/).

VPCID.Description: ID of your existing VPC for deployment
